translation.signupTitle: Sign up to create an account
translation.homePageIntro:
This service permits to show all the water quality measures collected by the community.

Login to see all the measures or sign up to create an account and start collecting water quality measures.

translation.menuItemAddMeasureGroupTitle: Add a new group of measures
translation.menuItemAddMeasureGroupDescription: If you want to collect several measures for the same location, choose this option. You will be able to follow how the measures change through the years.
translation.menuItemAddMeasureDescription: If you want to collect just one measure at a specific location and you already know you will not need historical data for this location, choose this option.
translation.menuItemAllMeasuresDescription: See all measures collected through the years and look for a place near you to know the calculated Water Quality Index at a specific point in time.
translation.menuItemFindSensorDescription: Check what are some of the sensors available on the market. Buy one and start measuring the quality of the water near you.
translation.homeIntroText: This is what you can do...
translation.settingsUsername: Username (max 20 chars, this is public and it's optional)
translation.settingsName: Name* (max 50 chars, this is private and it's mandatory)
translation.measureGroupExplaination: All related measures will have the same location and image of the measure group
